Messengers of the Infinity Mirrors

合(あ)わせ(わせ)鏡(かがみ)の(の)使(し)者(しゃ)awase kagami no shisha

"Angel Mirror"

"What is your wish? Glory or tragedy?"
RL

The story of two angels who came to Earth.

Lyrics

Versions

  • Original: The original version of the song released on gLoR10us and later featured on EVILS EXTRA.

Albums

Notes

  • The song was paired up with The Frog's and My Love Romance Sped Up in supplementary material for EVILS EXTRA.
